com.intuit.wasabi.api

Class AssignmentsResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intuit.wasabi.api.AssignmentsResource

  • public class AssignmentsResource
extends Object
    API endpoint for managing assignments

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAssignment(Application.Name applicationName, Experiment.Label experimentLabel, User.ID userID, Context context, Boolean createAssignment, Boolean ignoreSamplingPercent, javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
      Returns a bucket assignment (bucket label) for the specified user within the context of a specific application and experiment, if the user is chosen to be assigned to the experiment based on the probability of sampling percent.

      Get the length of the assignments queue

      Create/Retrieve assignments for a single user for experiments associated to a single page

      Returns a bucket assignment for the specified user within the context of one application and several experiments of an application

      Same as Assignment, but the user is chosen to be assigned to the experiment based on 1) profile eligibility and 2) probability of sampling percent.

      Tests if the profile parameters passed would satisfy the rule in the experiment specified.

    • Method Detail

      • getAssignment

        @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAssignment(Application.Name applicationName,
                                                      Experiment.Label experimentLabel,
                                                      User.ID userID,
                                                      Context context,
                                                      Boolean createAssignment,
                                                      Boolean ignoreSamplingPercent,
                                                      @Context
                                                      javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
        Returns a bucket assignment (bucket label) for the specified user within the context of a specific application and experiment, if the user is chosen to be assigned to the experiment based on the probability of sampling percent. Otherwise returns a null assignment for the specified user. By default, creates the bucket assignment if one does not exist. Otherwise set createAssignment to false.
        Parameters:
        applicationName - the unique application id
        experimentLabel - the experiment label, unique within the context of an application
        userID - the unique user id
        context - the context string
        createAssignment - the flag to create the experiment if one does not exists
        ignoreSamplingPercent - the flag if the sampling percentage should be ignored
        headers - the authorization headers
        Returns:
        Response object bucket payload

      • postAssignment

        @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response postAssignment(Application.Name applicationName,
                                                       Experiment.Label experimentLabel,
                                                       User.ID userID,
                                                       Boolean createAssignment,
                                                       Boolean ignoreSamplingPercent,
                                                       Context context,
                                                       SegmentationProfile segmentationProfile,
                                                       @Context
                                                       javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
        Same as Assignment, but the user is chosen to be assigned to the experiment based on 1) profile eligibility and 2) probability of sampling percent. Otherwise returns a null assignment for the specified user.
        Parameters:
        applicationName - the unique application id
        experimentLabel - the experiment label, unique within the context of an application
        userID - the unique user id
        createAssignment - the flag to create the experiment if one does not exists
        ignoreSamplingPercent - the flag if the sampling percentage should be ignored
        context - the context string
        segmentationProfile - the SegmentationProfile object
        headers - the authorization headers
        Returns:
        Response object

      • getBatchAssignments

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getBatchAssignments(Application.Name applicationName,
                                                     User.ID userID,
                                                     Context context,
                                                     Boolean createAssignment,
                                                     ExperimentBatch experimentBatch,
                                                     @Context
                                                     javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
        Returns a bucket assignment for the specified user within the context of one application and several experiments of an application
        Parameters:
        applicationName - the application name
        userID - the current user id
        context - the context string
        createAssignment - the boolean flag to create
        experimentBatch - the experiment batch expone, exptwo
        headers - the authorization headers
        Returns:
        Response object

      • updateAssignment

        @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateAssignment(Application.Name applicationName,
                                                         Experiment.Label experimentLabel,
                                                         User.ID userID,
                                                         Map<String,Object> submittedData,
                                                         Context context)
        Specify a bucket assignment for the specified user within the context of a specific application and experiment. Cannot use when the experiment is in DRAFT state because the buckets may change.
        Parameters:
        applicationName - the unique application id
        experimentLabel - the experiment label, unique within the context of an application
        userID - the unique user id
        submittedData - the data submitted by user
        context - the context string
        Returns:
        Response object

      • getBatchAssignmentForPage

        @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getBatchAssignmentForPage(Application.Name applicationName,
                                                                  Page.Name pageName,
                                                                  User.ID userID,
                                                                  boolean createAssignment,
                                                                  boolean ignoreSamplingPercent,
                                                                  Context context,
                                                                  @Context
                                                                  javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
        Create/Retrieve assignments for a single user for experiments associated to a single page
        Parameters:
        applicationName - Application Name
        pageName - Page Name
        userID - User Id
        createAssignment - Creates Assignment if set to true, default true
        ignoreSamplingPercent - Forces USer into experiment if set to true, default false
        context - Environment Context
        headers - Headers
        Returns:
        Response object

      • postBatchAssignmentForPage

        @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response postBatchAssignmentForPage(Application.Name applicationName,
                                                                   Page.Name pageName,
                                                                   User.ID userID,
                                                                   boolean createAssignment,
                                                                   boolean ignoreSamplingPercent,
                                                                   Context context,
                                                                   SegmentationProfile segmentationProfile,
                                                                   @Context
                                                                   javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
        Create/Retrieve assignments for a single user for experiments associated to a single page
        Parameters:
        applicationName - Application Name
        pageName - Page Name
        userID - User Id
        createAssignment - createAssignment boolean true will create an assignment
        ignoreSamplingPercent - If true, will force user into experiment, default false
        context - Environment context
        segmentationProfile - the SegmentationProfile object
        headers - Headers
        Returns:
        Response object which is List of Assignments for user for experiment of the page.

      • postAssignmentRuleTest

        @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response postAssignmentRuleTest(Application.Name applicationName,
                                                               Experiment.Label experimentLabel,
                                                               Context context,
                                                               SegmentationProfile segmentationProfile,
                                                               @Context
                                                               javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
        Tests if the profile parameters passed would satisfy the rule in the experiment specified.
        Parameters:
        applicationName - the application name
        experimentLabel - the experiment label
        context - the context string
        segmentationProfile - the SegmentationProfile object
        headers - the authorization headers
        Returns:
        Response object contains the rules fit with the requested parameters
